title: CBIC Extends Deadline for Sea Cargo Manifest and Transshipment Regulations, 2018
content:
# CBIC Extends Deadline for Sea Cargo Manifest and Transshipment Regulations, 2018

Ek important update hai! Government ne Sea Cargo Manifest and Transshipment Regulations, 2018 ke liye compliance ki date extend ki hai.

Here are the key details:
*   **Old Due Date:** The previous deadline for compliance was December 31, 2025.
*   **New Due Date:** The Central Board of Indirect Taxes and Customs (CBIC) has now extended this date to March 31, 2026.
*   **Notification Details:** This extension has been announced via Notification No. 79/2025â€“Customs (N.T.) dated December 31, 2025. This notification introduces the Sea Cargo Manifest and Transshipment (Fifth Amendment) Regulations, 2025, and specifically amends the entry against Serial No. 6 in column (3) of the Table after FORM-XII of the 2018 Regulations.

## Read the Official Document
*   [Download the Official Notification/Circular here](https://taxinformation.cbic.gov.in/view-pdf/1010532/ENG/Notifications)

*Published on: 3 January 2026*
